## Resources.CandidateReducer.reduceToLooseResourceCandidateDecls() method

Static convenience method to construct an array of properly reduced [loose resource candidate declarations](./ts-res.resourcejson.json.ilooseresourcecandidatedecl.md) from a set of [resource candidates](./ts-res.resources.resourcecandidate.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static reduceToLooseResourceCandidateDecls(id: ResourceId, candidates: ReadonlyArray<ResourceCandidate>, filterForContext?: Context.IValidatedContextDecl): Result<ResourceJson.Json.ILooseResourceCandidateDecl[]>;
```
